thread.section_title: Samuels Vehicle Hire Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Samuels Vehicle Hire | www.samuels.co.nz
thread.title: Thomas Cross
thread.title_full: Samuels Vehicle Hire reviewed by Thomas Cross

author: Thomas Cross
title: Thomas Cross
text: The Mercedes Sprinter was a superb vehicle with plenty of power for 10 people and their luggage. The seats were very comfortable and we found that the extra 2 seats (12 for 10 passengers) gave some room to stretch and move around. Samuels had an unusual way of handing over and receiving the vehicle that required coordination through mobile phones. It worked very well, was convenient and we were very pleased with the efficiency and courtesy of the staff. The cost of the vehicle was very reasonable when covered by 10 people. I thoroughly recommend Samuels and will use them again for future small group tour of New Zealand. Tom Cross
